short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables screen sharing on BookAnyone's Remote Tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enables screen sharing on BookAnyone's remote tool.

This extension is used for the desktop sharing feature in BookAnyone's remote tool (https://wb.bookanyone.com/demo).
